name: TableRowContent
desc: Conforming types represent rows used within a table.

items.name: var tableRowBody: Self.TableRowBody
items.desc: The composition of content that comprise the table row content.

items.name: associatedtype TableRowBody : TableRowContent
items.desc: The type of content representing the body of this table row content.

items.name: associatedtype TableRowValue : Identifiable = Self.TableRowBody.TableRowValue
items.desc: The type of value represented by this table row content.

items.name: func itemProvider((() -> NSItemProvider?)?) -> ModifiedContent<Self, ItemProviderTableRowModifier>
items.desc: Provides a closure that vends the drag representation to be used for a particular data element.

items.name: struct ItemProviderTableRowModifier
items.desc: A table row modifier that associates an item provider with some base row content.
